title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 97.6 - Initial review of actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 97.6 - Initial review of actions

State Regulations

Upon receipt of an application for a funding or approval action, the department shall: (a) determine whether the action is subject to SEQR. If the action is an exempt, an excluded, or a type II action, the agency shall have no further responsibilities under this Part; (b) determine whether the action involves a Federal agency. If the action involves a Federal agency, the provisions of section
97.15
of this Part shall apply; (c) determine whether the action involves one or more other agencies. (1)
if the action is a type I action, the provisions of section
97.7
of this Part shall govern the designation of lead agency; (2)
if the action is an unlisted action, the provisions of section
97.8
of this Part shall govern the designation of lead agency; (d) determine whether the action is located in the coastal area. If the action is either a type I action or an unlisted action and is in the coastal area, the provisions of 19 NYCRR Part
600
shall apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
97.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
